verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3198>Melchizedek,<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem,<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> Most <S%G5310>High,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4876>met<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G5290>returning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2871>slaughter<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3307>divided<s%> a tenth <S%G1181>part<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> (being <S%G4412>first,<s%> <S%G3303><s%> by <S%G2059>interpretation,<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem,<s%> which <S%G3603>is<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G1515>peace;<s%>

without <S%G540>father,<s%> without <S%G282>mother,<s%> without <S%G2192>genealogy,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> made <S%G871>like<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>), <S%G3306>remains<s%> a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1336>continually.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2334>consider<s%> how <S%G4080>great<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G3739>was,<s%> to whom <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> the <S%G3966>patriarch,<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> a <S%G1181>tenth<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the best <S%G2334>spoils.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G2983><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G3017>Levi<s%> who <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G2405>priest<s%>'s office <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1785>commandment<s%> to take tithes <S%G586>of<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> <S%G80>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2539>though<s%> these have come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3751>body<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> he whose genealogy <S%G1075>is<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1075>counted<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> has accepted <S%G1183>tithes<s%> from <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> has <S%G2127>blessed<s%> him who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G1860>promises.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G485>dispute<s%> the <S%G1640>lesser<s%> is <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G2909>greater.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5602%G99999>Here<s%> <S%G444>people<s%> who <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1181>tithes,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3140>one<s%> receives tithes of whom it is <S%G3140>testified<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2198>lives.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> We <S%G5613>can<s%> <S%G2031>say<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3017>Levi,<s%> who <S%G2983>receives<s%> <S%G1181>tithes,<s%> has paid <S%G1183>tithes,<s%>
<S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3751>body<s%> of his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%> <S%G4876>met<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Now <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3767>there<s%> <S%G3303>were<s%> <S%G5050>perfection<s%> <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3020>Levitical<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G1909>under<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> have received the <S%G3549>law<s%>), <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2089>further<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> was there <S%G450>for<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> to <S%G450>arise<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G2>Aaron?<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> being <S%G3346>changed,<s%> there is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G318>necessity<s%> a <S%G3331>change<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3348>he<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> are <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3348>belongs<s%> <S%G5443>to<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G5443>tribe,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> no <S%G3762>one<s%> has <S%G4337>officiated<s%> at the <S%G2379>altar.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G4271>evident<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G393>sprung<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2448>Judah,<s%> <S%G1519>about<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood.<s%>

<S%G2532>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4054>more<s%> abundantly <S%G2612>evident,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3665>likeness<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%> there <S%G450>arises<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2409>priest,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> has been <S%G1096>made,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1785>a<s%> <S%G4559>fleshly<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2222>an<s%> <S%G179>endless<s%> <S%G2222>life:<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G3754>testified,<s%> <S%G4771>"You<s%> are a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519>forever,<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek.<s%>"

<S%G1063>For<s%> there <S%G1096%G99999>is<s%> an <S%G115>annulling<s%> of a <S%G4254>foregoing<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G772>weakness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G512>uselessness<s%>

<S%G1063>(for<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%>), and <S%G1680>a<s%> bringing <S%G1898>in<s%> of <S%G1680>a<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1680>hope,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we draw <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2596>Inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> he was <S%G3756>not<s%> made priest <S%G5565>without<s%> the taking of an <S%G3728>oath<s%>

<S%G1063%G99999>(for<s%> they indeed have <S%G1526>been<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> an <S%G3728>oath<s%>), <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G3326>with<s%> an <S%G3728>oath<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> that <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G4314>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3660>swore<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3338>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> change his <S%G3338>mind,<s%> <S%G4771><s%> 'You are a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519>forever,<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek.<s%>'"
<S%G2596>By<s%> so <S%G5118>much,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1096>has<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G1450>collateral<s%> of <S%G1242>a<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1242>covenant.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G4119>Many,<s%> <S%G3303>indeed,<s%> have <S%G1526>been<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2409>priests,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G1526>they<s%> are <S%G2967>hindered<s%> from <S%G3887>continuing<s%> by <S%G2288>death.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846>he,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3306>lives<s%> <S%G1519>forever,<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> his <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> <S%G531>unchangeable.<s%>

<S%G3606>Therefore<s%> he is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3838>uttermost<s%> those who draw <S%G4334>near<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> seeing that <S%G2198>he<s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G3842>forever<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> make <S%G1793>intercession<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> was <S%G4241>fitting<s%> for <S%G2254>us:<s%> <S%G3741>holy,<s%> <S%G172>guiltless,<s%> <S%G283>undefiled,<s%> <S%G5563>separated<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5308>higher<s%> than the <S%G3772>heavens;<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G318>need,<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5618>like<s%> those high <S%G749>priests,<s%> to offer <S%G399>up<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G2250>daily,<s%> <S%G4386>first<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> and <S%G1899>then<s%> for the sins of the <S%G2992>people.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%> for <S%G399>all,<s%> when he offered up <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2525>appoints<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> as high <S%G749>priests<s%> who <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G769>weakness,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G3728>oath<s%> which <S%G3588>came<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> appoints a <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> who has been <S%G5048>perfected.<s%>
